title: Cyclodextrin metal–organic framework@SiO2 nanocomposites for poorly soluble drug loading and release
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,31868-31876
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04935G, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Shuai Liu, Yuzhu Xiong, Fuping Dong
The γ-CD-MOF was synthesized through a vapor diffusion process, upon which the CD-MOF@SiO2 nanocomposite was constructed to enable the stable loading and sustained release of the poorly soluble drug, folic acid.
